attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 immediately as per the majority vote of the British public!
attributes.additional_details:
My Cameron stated he would invoke article 50 immediately after a vote to leave the European Union. This is not the case and instead he is delaying causing uncertainty and divisions. 
Invoking article 50 initiates the process of leaving the European Union, this is the wish of the voted majority in the EU Referendum.
attributes.background: The majority vote of the British public in the recent EU referendum was to leave the European Union. The government are now delaying invoking Article 50 to initiate the process. Delays are causing uncertainty and division.
